TextBlock.Text: FOLI: Everyone remain adhesive! Don't lose sight of your group leader!
FOLI: We'll need to make use of this seed's unique properties to make the journey through the <color=orange>Red Seed</color>.
FOLI: Keek, thank you. We couldn't have managed this without your engineering ingenuity.
KEEK: Same to you, Foli. After everything that's happened since the crash, I'm glad I could contribute.
